message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9,500. It's a great deal for both of us, as you know it's worth $10,000 to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,800. It's a fair price considering the product is worth $10,000 to me.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $8,800 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $9,200. This is a fair price considering the value of the product to both of us.  Let's make this happen!
I understand you're trying to make a profit, but I'm not comfortable with $9,200. I'm willing to meet you halfway and pay $8,500. This is my final offer.
